name: Alameda County Family Justice Center
description: One-stop center with legal, counseling, and advocacy services
fullDescription: The Alameda County Family Justice Center brings together multiple agencies under one roof to provide comprehensive services including legal help, counseling, victim advocacy, and support for families seeking safety.
whatTheyOffer:
- One-stop services center
- Legal assistance
- Victim advocacy
- Counseling services
- Restraining order help
- Immigration assistance
- Children's services
- Multiple agencies in one location
howToGetIt:
1. Call: 510-267-8800
2. Walk-in welcome during business hours
3. Appointment recommended but not required
4. Access multiple services in one visit
5. All services free and confidential
6. Interpretation available
keywords: Family Justice Center, Alameda County, Oakland, one-stop services, legal assistance, victim advocacy, counseling, restraining order, immigration, children services, 510-267-8800
